profile.text: Proficient higher education administrator with 6+ years in the International Relations field. Specializing in European and US immigration law and cultural integration of students.

Additionally, with a deep dedication to the enrichment of student experiences by fostering partnerships with international universities. Proven efficiency with an ability to quickly learn policy and procedure.

education.title: Master Degree in Communication and Museum Education

responsability.text: Organized and managed cultural integration activities/workshops; and new international student orientation week
Incoming and outgoing student immigration orientation complying with local and foreign immigration laws
Designed and coordinated the Buddy Program to help international student adaptation
Negotiated and executed partnership agreements with universities around the world in order to facilitate international student exchanges
Established administrative work procedures; trained and supervised student interns and volunteers
Developed policy and procedure guidelines for exchange of students, staff and faculty members
Developed modern art education curriculum for children ages 9-11
Assisted in the planning and implementation of the museum’s summer events series for children and adults including the event “De Noche, El Museo Suena”
Student preparation for First Certificate, TOEFL, IELTS and other English proficiency exams
